```{r}
# load one coef plot from noclust we want to inspect
library(ggplot2)
coef_plot <- readRDS("../results/CV-fused/large-fused-5k-stand-gamma-01/coef-plots/coef-plot-full.rds")
coef_plot
```
```{r}
coef_plot$layers[[2]]$aes_params$size <- 0.75
coef_plot_now <- coef_plot
c1 <- coef_plot_now + scale_colour_gradient2(name="Coefficients")
```
```{r}
library(patchwork)
c1+c1+c1+c1+c1+c1
```


```{r}
object.size(coef_plot)
library(pryr)
compare_size(coef_plot)
```
```{r}
ggsave("../results/CV-fused/large-fused-5k-stand-gamma-01/coef-plots/test-ggsave.png", plot = coef_plot_now)
```


```{r}
knitr::include_graphics("../results/CV-fused/large-fused-5k-stand-gamma-01/coef-plots/test-ggsave.png")
```
